Articles.Content:
Just trying out the new rcs thrusters...

![sstob.jpg](http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/3558/sstob.jpg)
Almost like the one I took to Minmus and back.
What are the decouplers for? To keep it off the ground?
Jeeze, C7 needs a LOT of balance still.

> 
> Jeeze, C7 needs a LOT of balance still.

Everything needs balance, C7 just needs more ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
